title: About LexisNexis

text: LexisNexis is a business providing legal and business information, analytics, and technology. Their products include Lexis+ (with Litigation Analytics), Nexis, and law books sold through their online store. The company uses AI (implied by the mention of "analytics" and the nature of their data products) to enhance its offerings. Their strategy involves combining information with technology to improve customer workflows and strengthen the rule of law. A search functionality is prominent on their website.
title: LexisNexis Innovation

text: LexisNexis offers Lexis+ AI, a legal research platform and AI assistant. The product integrates AI (Protégé) with LexisNexis content to help legal professionals make faster, informed decisions and produce high-quality work. Key features include AI-powered legal document drafting (full documents, motions, complaints, correspondence), drafting from firm knowledge via DMS integration, and personalized document creation. A Forrester study commissioned by LexisNexis showed a 344% ROI for large law firms using Lexis+ AI. The platform targets legal professionals and offers a free trial. The business strategy focuses on improving efficiency and driving value through AI-enhanced legal research and drafting capabilities.
